= DEFIMON Project Templates =

This page contains reusable templates for consistent formatting across the DEFIMON project documentation.

== Information Box Templates ==

=== Project Info Box ===
<pre>
{{Infobox Project
| name = DEFIMON
| fullname = DeFi Analytics Platform
| description = Comprehensive platform for DeFi analytics and monitoring with AI/ML integration
| version = 2.0
| status = Active Development
| license = MIT
| website = https://defimon.com
| repository = https://github.com/your-username/defimon.highfunk.uk
| documentation = https://docs.defimon.com
}}
</pre>
